name: Soul Harvester - Post LD
description:
Soul Harvester is a top-down bullet hell and the goal is to shoot, harvest and survive against waves of monsters. 

Become stronger: Harvesting souls allows you to purchase upgrades, for example more damage, larger bullets and a dash ability. With these upgrades, try to survive as long as possible and obtain a new high score! My highest score is 126 on wave 22, and I challenge you to beat it!

Background: You have been imprisoned inside a dungeon full of monsters trying to kill you. Fortunately, you wield magic and have the power of absorbing souls, which can help you survive and become more powerful.

LD52: The original version was a submission for Ludum Dare 52, which had the theme harvest and it was made under 72 hours. This new version is an improvement of the original game, so try the new version now to find out what has been improved!

Beware - the game can be difficult for people who are unfamiliar with top-down shooters.

Tips (spoilers)
  • You can hold the left mouse button to shoot
  • You can push enemies by dashing or walking into them 
  • Evil souls (the red souls) spawn as red graves that are harvestable, which will prevent the enemy from spawning.
  • Some enemies become stronger every five waves.
